players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Bob, you killed Alice. Vote him out."
Charlie: "I think Bob is mafia. Vote him out."
You: "I didn't kill Alice, maybe Diana is lying about me."
Charlie: "I think Bob is mafia because he denies killing Alice, but Diana says he did. Vote him out."
You: "I didn't kill Alice, maybe you misheard. I was with Charlie. Maybe you misinterpreted my words."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He denied killing Alice, but that's impossible. Vote him out."

Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "I think Bob is mafia. Vote him out."
Bob: "I didn't kill Alice, maybe Diana is lying about me."
Charlie: "I think Bob is mafia because he denies killing Alice, but Diana says he did. Vote him out."
Bob: "I didn't kill Alice, maybe you misheard. I was with Charlie. Maybe you misinterpreted my words."
You: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He denied killing Alice, but that's impossible. Vote him out."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
